string.value: You gathered the recycling materials that Pio asked for, and he said he'd make you something nice in return.
Pio promised to make you a nice relaxing chair with the recylicing materials you gathered for him.
You helped Pio gather recycling materials, and he made you a nice comfortable chair in exchange.
I got the recycling materials you got me, and I some leftovers that I don't need. Would you like me to make something nice with it for you?
Ahh, the green cloth should be here somewhere... Hmm, and I should cut this wood, and put the screws on, and… Please come back in a little bit. I'll get this done by then!
Eh? You don't doubt my skills, do you?
Perfect timing! How did you know that I'm done? Very impressive!
Doesn't it look comfy? This chair is very handy. When you're low on HP and MP, just take the chair out and rest!

It'll let you relax and you'll be able to recover more quickly. Because of that, I've named the chair…The Relaxer! Great name, right? Don't forget that The Relaxer was made by yours truly, the great Pio!
